column1: Average household expenditures, by selected metropolitan area
Reading materials and other printed matter
Personal insurance payments and pension contributions

Note: Metropolitan area: the overall concept for delineating metropolitan areas is one of a large urban area together with adjacent urban and rural areas that have a high degree of social and economic integration with this urban area.
Source: Statistics Canada, CANSIM, table (for fee) 203-0001 and Catalogue no. 62F0026MIE.
